title: Looking for a Team (Bronze and Silver)
body:
Hi Guys

Currently looking for someone to fill the following three Roles, we'll play our team provisional matches and then play together a lot for a few weeks before entering some OCE tournaments if we feel like it.

Positions to be filled:
Jungle - 
Support - 
Top - 

Please reply with 

Age:
Position/rank:
Availability:

replies.body: can i join for the lols im plat 5 - but can use my old old muck around thats in b4 i think

If you are still interested in playing, add me and be on over the weekend. I will invite you to team and we can all play a few games together to see if it works. Will be funny having a plat member on the team. plus you can be our shot caller!

Age: 20
Position/rank: Any of the aboves (silver 2)
Availability: Most nights... unless weekends...on most of that time

Age: 21
Position/rank: top/jg Gold 1 ( play more like gold 4/5)
Availability: every night
If you are still interested in playing, add me and be on over the weekend. I will invite you to team and we can all play a few games together to see if it works. If you are keen to jg...

Hey
Age: 20
Position/rank: B4 sadly, top/mid/support
Availability: Most nights, some days
If you are still interested in playing, add me and be on over the weekend. I will invite you to team and we can all play a few games together to see if it works. If yo are Keen to top....

Hey man,

Age: 20
Position/rank: I can fill but pref supp, was B4 a week ago now B2.
Availability: Pretty much every single night of the week, if not  would let you know in advance
If you are still interested in playing, add me and be on over the weekend. I will invite you to team and we can all play a few games together to see if it works.

Age: 22
Position: Top & Support (Jungle Possibly)
Rank: Season 1 - Diamond | Season 2 - Gold | Season 3 Silver | Season 3 Silver |
Availability: Anytime.

RandomPanda

Age: 13
Position/rank: Top (main {{champion:92}} /{{champion:157}} /{{champion:238}} ) Bronze II
Availability: 4pm-6pm
If u want me in your team please add me asap I'll send a friend request to you
